Let's go to Zoshigaya and find out.

Apparently the tabby hasn't been seen for some time.
Maybe the nearby residents or shopkeepers might know something about it. Time to put on my detective hat and ask around.

I don't have any other leads so far, so I might as well go and investigate.

I should try asking him...

name: Save the Cat!

Neko Takahashi did not go out at the scheduled time, but she does have a habit of ordering flowers.
She'll probably go out to pick them up.
I might have a chance to talk to her if I pick up her order from the florist and act as a delivery person.

name: Save the Cat!

Now all I have to do is deliver it to Neko Takahashi.
This bouquet will never wither, no matter how long it's carried around.

name: Save the Cat!

It turns out the orange tabby was injured, but Neko Takahashi has been taking care of him the whole time. She promised to take him back to Zoshigaya tomorrow.
If I wait until tomorrow, the orange tabby should have returned by then.

details: I wonder how Minami's getting on. If I have the time, I should go check up on her again.

name: Steel Your Heart
details: Minami has something that she wants to discuss. I'll wait for her to come back, then hear what's on her mind.

name: Steel Your Heart
details:
I agreed to be there for Minami when she talks with her father.
I'll give her some time, then see how she's doing.

name: Steel Your Heart
details: I wonder how Minami's doing? I should see if she's ready to talk to her father like we discussed.

name: Steel Your Heart
details: Just as we discussed, Minami says she's ready to speak with her father. Let's head to her family's shop.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details: There's a lively lady standing near the Shinjuku street stands... Maybe I should go and talk to her.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details: There's a ton of drunk people out in Shinjuku... I need to hurry to the station and take the subway home.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details:
Some drunk guy tried to give me trouble, but that lady from before came to my rescue.
I'm grateful for Chizuko's help, and chat with her in a bar.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
targetName: Go home and wait until tomorrow
details:
I exchange contact details with Chizuko, and form a new friendship that transcends the age gap.
I should contact her sometime.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details: I got a message from Chizuko.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details:
Chizuko said she's at the bar we chatted at last time in Shinjuku.
Guess I should head over there.

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details:
I had a deep conversation with Chizuko. 
Turns out she's the grandmother of that girl I saw jump from the building in Shimo-Kitazawa...

name: A Heartfelt Message: Part 1
details: I've gotten to know Chizuko Nagao, the liquor-loving lady. She's concerned about her granddaughter's recovery.

name: The Golden Ring
details: I received a strange message... I should be careful when I go to Kichijoji.

name: The Golden Ring
details: I remembered that message from before... Maybe I'll notice something if I wander around the area.

name: The Golden Ring
details:
Neko Takahashi said she would induct me into the "NK Church"...
I have no idea what this means, but I'll go along with it for now.

name: The Golden Ring
details: The ceremony is over, but Takahashi looks like she still has something she wants to say...

name: Paw it Forward
targetName: Hand the glass orbs to the tabby
details: After much searching, I finally found all of the glass orbs. Now I need to find the orange tabby. I might be in for a nice reward...

name: Paw it Forward
details: The orange tabby is walking along the ridge toward my garden. Could there be something special there? I better head home and take a look.

name: Trembling Strings
details: There's a girl who performs at Shibuya's Central Street. She's so nervous, it seems like she forgot the words to her song. I should go cheer her on if I have time.

name: Trembling Strings
details: After taking a break, the girl seemed reinvigorated and said she wanted to perform again. I should go watch.
